mapper.sql: ID, USERNAME, REALNAME, WORK_ID, PASSWORD, LEVEL, STATUS, PHONE, EMAIL
mapper.insert: insert into admin_user (ID, USERNAME, REALNAME, WORK_ID, PASSWORD, LEVEL, STATUS, PHONE, EMAIL) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=BIT}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into admin_user
ID,
USERNAME,
REALNAME,
WORK_ID,
PASSWORD,
LEVEL,
STATUS,
PHONE,
EMAIL,

mapper.update:
update admin_user
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REALNAME = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_ID = #{workId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=BIT},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update admin_user set USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REALNAME = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORK_ID = #{workId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=BIT}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
